title: DebtSeniorityEnum
description: Specifies the order of repayment in the event of a sale or bankruptcy of the issuer or a related party (eg guarantor).

oneOf.title: Secured
oneOf.description: Denotes debt which is secured over assets of the issuer or a related party (eg guarantor).

oneOf.title: Senior
oneOf.description: Denotes debt  which ranks pari passu with all other unsecured creditors of the issuer.

oneOf.title: Subordinated
oneOf.description: Denotes debt  owed to an unsecured creditor that in the event of a liquidation can only be paid after the claims of secured and senior creditors have been met.
